forThisWeNeed: For this trip we need: - One thing...

editorMessage: If you don't want to change the value of the field, just leave it as it is. If you want to replace images, use the appropriate fields. If you do not select new images, the old ones will be saved.
laurel: 'Laurel' is given for the creation of 10+ instructions
champion: 'Champion' is given first place in the top
star: 'Star' is given for getting a raiting 50+
beginner: 'Beginner' is given for the creation of the first instruction
commentator: 'Commentator' is given for the leaving of 10+ comments
author: Author
singInForComments: You should sign in or sign up to read comments.
chooseYourAvatar: Choose your avatar or drag it here
greetingsLine2: DocsPlace is a platform for managing corporate knowledge. This system allows you to store, accumulate and process the experience of workers in the form of clear instructions.
greetingsLine3: To use the system, log in to your account or register.
greetingsLine4: Be careful when filling out the registration form. The correct data will allow you to create a good account.
greetingsLine5: By registering, you can create your own instructions, read and leave comments, as well as get access to the system of ratings and achievements.
name: Name
variantMessage: You can describe your instruction using the markup editor or using the step generator below. (You can use both options at once)
